Question.Subject: deleted my twitter accidentally?
Question.Content: i accidentally deleted my twitter account and i need it back :( how can i do that? is there anyway it said restoring is not possible NOW if so when will it be possible
Question.ChosenAnswer: that happened to me TWICE haha i reopened it before and now i'm trying again but it also says its unavailable at the moment, soo i keep checking this link, to see when its availablee ; http://help.twitter.com/entries/16807-i-can-t-restore-my-account just check it like everyday until it says available :)

Answer.Content: When you delete an account, the site assumes you no longer want it and so delete the information from their database. Your account is gone
Its not possible maybe you wont delete it next time

that happened to me TWICE haha i reopened it before and now i'm trying again but it also says its unavailable at the moment, soo i keep checking this link, to see when its availablee ; http://help.twitter.com/entries/16807-i-can-t-restore-my-account just check it like everyday until it says available :)
